Sentencas: While local surface composition of fuel cell electrode is critical to performance, precise control of the surface composition at the thickness scale of <10 nm has been challenging.
Titulo: Doping-level control of atomic layer deposited YSZ surface layer on platinum catalyst

Sentencas: Here we report on the fabrication of ultra-thin (5 nm-thick)
Titulo: Doping-level control of atomic layer deposited YSZ surface layer on platinum catalyst

Sentencas: yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) surface layers whose compositions are precisely controlled by using atomic layer deposition (ALD), and their applications to cathodic overlayers of low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Doping-level control of atomic layer deposited YSZ surface layer on platinum catalyst

Sentencas: Exchange current density was improved by 80% by optimizing the doping level (16 mol%) of YSZ overlayer.
Titulo: Doping-level control of atomic layer deposited YSZ surface layer on platinum catalyst

Sentencas: Activation resistance of the cell with 16 mol% doped ALD YSZ overlayer decreased by 27%, and the cell performance improved by 70% compared to the cell without the overlayer.
Titulo: Doping-level control of atomic layer deposited YSZ surface layer on platinum catalyst

Sentencas: Such improvement was attrib-uted to the ability of the doping-controlled ALD YSZ overlayer to locally improve O2- incorporation, which is the rate-determining step of oxygen reduction reaction, at the cathode surface.
Titulo: Doping-level control of atomic layer deposited YSZ surface layer on platinum catalyst
